title: What day does Sinead die in Coronation Street?
text:
Coronation Street fans are preparing to say goodbye to Sinead Tinker (Picture: ITV)

Sinead Tinker’s (Katie McGlynn) heartbreaking storyline is about to come to an end as her final moments air on Coronation Street.

The character has been battling cervical cancer and will succumb to the illness surrounded by her loved ones in devastating scenes this week.

Sinead’s world came crashing down on her wedding day after she discovered the cancer had spread to her lymph nodes and liver, giving her just months to live.

The young mum and husband Daniel (Rob Mallard) have been making the most of their time left together, with Sinead also recording emotional messages for her baby son Bertie.

What day does Sinead die in Coronation Street?

Sinead’s final scenes will air on October 25 with the character passing away with Daniel and Bertie on the bed with her.

The Barlow and Tinker families gather in the Rovers to await news and share stories and fond memories about Sinead.

Sinead and Dan have been making the most of her last weeks (Picture: ITV)

Actress Katie admitted the storyline has took its toll on her mental health, however she was proud to have raised awareness on the condition.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Speaking on Loose Women, she said: ‘I kind of underestimated the effects that it’s had on my mental health.

‘I sound silly saying it but I believe Sinead is real. I played her for six-and-a-half years. Me and Corrie created this character and I feel like she’s my friend.’

She continued: ‘Watching her die was just awful, but it’s raising awareness and I just hope that we are doing that.

‘I love this storyline because it covers so many issues. I just wanted to highlight the fact people are dying of cancer.’

Coronation Street continues tonight at 7.30pm on ITV.

description: Coronation Street's young mum Sinead Tinker has been battling cervical cancer with her final days fast-approaching.
